name: Writing Workshops
description: The Writing and Performance Workshops are the heart of Youth Speaks. Young people come together with an amazing poet mentor to imagine, write, share and rehearse. Writing and Performance Workshops are spaces for young people to imagine, write, share and rehearse in preparation for a culminating event or publication at the end of each semester. The San Francisco Youth Poet Laureate Workshops are an advanced writing series for a cohort of 15 San Francisco youth (aged 13-19) to develop writing abou

howToGetIt: Youth Registration Form Sign up for all Youth Speaks related activities for youth age 13-21 years old! For the latest information, visit http://youthspeaks.org/programs
